title: Higher interest rates cause currency appreciation

content.prompt: If the central bank of Country K wishes to increase the value of its currency on foreign exchange markets, it can do which of the following?

choices.label: Buy the currencies of other countries
Increase the domestic money supply in Country K
Increase the income tax in Country K
Raise interest rates in Country K

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.6: Real Interest Rates and International Capital Flows

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
